full_summary:
# Cancelled Tender Notice for Hazardous Material Spill Containment and Clean-up Equipment and Material

## Tender Details

### Reference Number: PW_ERD_016_29022

### Solicitation Number: F7047-190148/B

### Publication Date: 2023-03-27

### Tender Closing Date: *Cancelled*

### Amendment Number: 0

## Description of Goods or Services

* **HSIN Category:** Hazardous Material Spill Containment and Clean-up Equipment and Material (G0086)
* **HSIN Description:**
	+ English: Hazardous material spill containment and clean-up equipment and material
	+ French: Rétenue des fuites et débordements de produits dangereux et matériel de nettoyage

## Trade Agreements

* Bilateral trade agreements:
	+ Canada- Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
	+ Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
	+ World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Multilateral trade agreements:
	+ Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
	+ Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

## Contracting Entity and End User Entity

Public Works and Government Services Canada
11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada

### End User Entity:

200 Kent St, Station 13E228, Ottawa, Ontario K1A 0E6, Canada
